short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PomodoroGo is an app that helps boost productivity by blocking social media and providing a focus timer and data dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever felt like you are way too distracted at your computer? If you feel like you are being overwhelmed by updates, alerts and push notifications, PomodoroGo is here to help you stay focused!

Key features:
- web-site-blocker
- focus timer
- data dashboard
- opens in a new tab so that you can view the dashboard and settings using the entire window  

Download PomodoroGo today and leave all of those distracting web-sites behind!
